63.eng-name: Merits of the Helpers in Madinah (Ansaar)

hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn 'Abbas:To run along the valley between two green pillars of Safa and Marwa (mountains) was not Sunna, but the people in the pre-islamic period of ignorance used to run along it, and used to say: "We do not cross this rain stream except running strongly

chapter.eng-name: Al-Qasama in the Pre-Islamic Period of Ignorance
